posts.post_content:
@Just1Micky   
 what do you mean [Bazaar Trader](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bazaar Trader)??? Your opponent would gain control of your 4/4 creature and YOU would still have to pay the 4R or you lose. The spell says you have to pay, not the creature. It would not matter if you cast this, got the creature and took a crap on the table, your still going to have to pay. No matter what, if this spell resolves, you better be ready to pay that 5 mana or lose the game. (Unless ya got something that says you can't lose the game).

posts.post_content:
The worst pact. If it had haste it would be reasonable, but come on! 5 mana for a vanilla 4/4? that doesn't cut out for a good spell. I would have even preferred something as unoriginal as this:  
  
Pact of Lightning  
0cmc  
Pact of Lightning is Red. Deal 3 damage to target creature or player. At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay RR. If you don't, you lose the game.  
  
It's completely boring, and uninteresting, but at LEAST it's a better card than this in my humble opinion.
posts.html:
The worst pact. If it had haste it would be reasonable, but come on! 5 mana for a vanilla 4/4? that doesn't cut out for a good spell. I would have even preferred something as unoriginal as this:

Pact of Lightning
0cmc
Pact of Lightning is Red. Deal 3 damage to target creature or player. At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay RR. If you don't, you lose the game.

It's completely boring, and uninteresting, but at LEAST it's a better card than this in my humble opinion.

posts.post_content:
I remember thinking up a possible, but unlikely 1st turn win with this card in standard at one point.  
Opening hand of:  
4 [Pact of the Titan](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pact of the Titan)  
[Leyline of the Meek](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Leyline of the Meek)  
[Surge of Zeal](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Surge of Zeal)  
[Mountain](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mountain)  
  
[Leyline of the Meek](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Leyline of the Meek) comes into play for free.  
Turn 1: Cast all [Pact of the Titan](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pact of the Titan) spells. Mountain. Cast [Surge of Zeal](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Surge of Zeal) on one of the giant tokens giving them all haste, and alpha strike for the victory.
posts.html:
I remember thinking up a possible, but unlikely 1st turn win with this card in standard at one point.
Opening hand of:
4 Pact of the Titan
Leyline of the Meek
Surge of Zeal
Mountain

Leyline of the Meek comes into play for free.
Turn 1: Cast all Pact of the Titan spells. Mountain. Cast Surge of Zeal on one of the giant tokens giving them all haste, and alpha strike for the victory.
